Kind of a strange error but in the many times I get lost, the customer assist is ready and available. That I appreciate.

Review.Titre: Great app and fantastic,so easy cool app
We feel we are dealing with great values
Review.Contenu: It was a very practical way although at first I struggled for some time to be familiar with it. I would just suggest a clearer way the information are displayed in the app. However for me the most important part is the customer service online whom were very kind and extremely patient with me and very professional with their approach .they would always go an extra mile and very politely answer my questions So Thank you so much Keep the great work.Lea

Review.Titre: Great support - 2 issues fixed first time
Review.Contenu: Once I figured out that my pop-up blocker was stopping me from finding the online live support chat, it was all excellent service from there on.I had two separate challenges which were sorted out by the next day or so. So far its been a good experience with RemotePass.
Wonderful flexible support team. Going over and beyond to help you with your query. They are super heroes to avoid complicating things. I really love Remotepass!

Review.Titre: I am writing this from Amer center…
Review.Contenu: I am writing this from Amer center Burdubai. It is so simple method for receiving the payment. I could do the more  immigration department work without the customer come to our office.. I appreciate the remote pass team for this great work.....May God bless you
Naqash was helping me. I'm very nervous about this since it's my first time using this app and this money is mean much for me. I'm so grateful he patiently help me solve my problem.
This solution is very easy to use and support team was outstanding! More power to you RemotePass!

Reem, solved a really big challenge for me, and she was so sweet, empathetic and kind. She was with me throughout the process, and when I told her that I am a little scared of the process, she offered to stay and help in every step. The responses were also prompt, and it felt so safe that just because of Reem, Remotepass has become the most convenient portal for me. Thanks a lot Reem, your help means a lot to me!

I was invited by an employer to onboard using RemotePass and my experience so far has been great. Their support team is top-notch, especially Sameer. The thing I enjoy the most is the multiple withdrawal methods they support. I can easily switch from a bank account to another or even receive my salary via PayPal. No delays in processing payments. Top!

The onboarding tax laws in KSA are super complicated. Thanks to RemotePass we’ve been able to hire KSA talent without having to learn the nitty grrity. RemotePass takes care of everything, to ensure that all the legal aspects are covered!!!
User friendly and easy to connect with my bank, a very supportive customer service team that reached out to make sure I wasn't facing any issue with activating my account.

Review.Titre: Essential tool for managing my remote team
Review.Contenu: I've been using RemotePass for 8 months, so far my team and I are happy with it. It has become an essential tool to manage contracts, payments and tax collection for my global teams. The support team is very helpful. Would be great to see an integration with Odoo ERP.

Seamless experience and easy to use as an employee. I can manage my contract and my pay without thinking too much about it. Especially with the auto-withdrawals. Also, Heath Insurance is an important feature as well. I'm working remotely and I am insured.

So smooth, so goodThe team at Remotepass is extremely helpful. The product is very easy to use for both us and our team members. It solved a very significant pain point we had when it came to paying our remote team members as well as our full time employees in Lebanon.Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: Simple, reliable platform for freelancers to receive payments
Review.Contenu: I've been using RemotePass for over 6 months. The set-up was easy and the team responded promptly whenever I needed help.The platform's auto withdrawal and transaction history features are extremely helpful. It's an easy and reliable way to receive international payments. Freelancers, do try this platform.

Review.Titre: I really appreciate and thank the…
Review.Contenu: I really appreciate and thank the remotepass team for building such a seamless product! The new app is more like a Christmas gift to me! Keep growing remotepass team!
The customer service team is super helpful! They are professional and solve your problems very fast. Love it!

Customer support is very helpful.I had an issue that my transfer took a bit long than I expected. I contact the support team in chat and they were helpful and follow up the case until I received my transfer.thanks.

Outstanding support. I find the product very easy to use, I receive my payments on time. I signed up for medical insurance directly on remotepass but i have not used it yet. I like that i can pay for it monthly directly on the app. I recommend.

I was very pleased to see that RemotePass now has health insurance enabled. As a contractor, it is important to me that I am insured and the platform has made that possible! Thank you for adding this option for us!
I get paid on time and recently signed up for medical insurance in 2 click. I was I would recommend this platform to anyone. Still hesitant to test getting paid in crypto.

Review.Contenu: response time for issues is very fast, and design interface and withdraw times are really fast, good job

many thanks a lot

Great work!
